name: Math Machine
description:
Math Machine

How is a math test experienced from the point of view of the machines involved with them?

1. Clock: each time you press a key down, you advance one second. When you reach a minute the difference between a real minute and “your minute” affects your score.

2. Calculator: use the numbers to type the right result and press enter to submit.

3. Exam: Do clock and calculator at the same time.
